content.text:
# Ancient Classics for English Readers

The Ancient Classics for English Readers series was a collection of 28 volumes of classics of ancient Greek and Latin literature, translated into English with paraphrases and commentaries by leading classical scholars. The series was published from 1870 in Edinburgh and London by William Blackwood and Sons. From 1870 J. B. Lippincott & Co. republished the series in Philadelphia. The founding editor was W. Lucas Collins.
Volumes in the series
*[https://catalog.hathitrust.org/Record/100130423 Homer: The Iliad], 1870, By W. Lucas Collins, M.A.
*[https://catalog.hathitrust.org/Record/100130425 Homer: The Odyssey], 1870, By W. Lucas Collins, M.A.
*[https://catalog.hathitrust.org/Record/100881995 Herodotus], 1870, By George C. Swayne, M.A.
*[https://catalog.hathitrust.org/Record/008586346 The commentaries of Cæsar], 1870, By Anthony Trollope.
*[https://catalog.hathitrust.org/Record/007679025 Virgil], 1870, By W. Lucas Collins, M.A.
*[https://catalog.hathitrust.org/Record/008674206 Horace], 1870, By Theodore Martin.
*[https://catalog.hathitrust.org/Record/001812123 Æschylus], 1871, By the Right Rev. Reginald Copleston, the Bishop of Colombo.
*[https://catalog.hathitrust.org/Record/006527626 Xenophon], 1871, By Sir Alexander Grant, 10th Baronet, LL.D.

*[https://catalog.hathitrust.org/Record/001809582 Pliny's letters], 1872, By Alfred John Church, M.A., and William Jackson Brodribb, M.A.
*[https://catalog.hathitrust.org/Record/006527735 Euripides], 1872, By William Bodham Donne.

*[https://catalog.hathitrust.org/Record/008643985 Tacitus], 1873, By William Bodham Donne.
*[https://catalog.hathitrust.org/Record/006109746 Lucian], 1873, By W. Lucas Collins, M.A.
*[https://catalog.hathitrust.org/Record/006525828 Plato], 1874, By Clifton W. Collins.

*[https://catalog.hathitrust.org/Record/007697348 Ovid], 1876, By the Rev. Alfred John Church, M.A
*[https://catalog.hathitrust.org/Record/007694225 Catullus, Tibullus, and Propertius], 1876, By the Rev. James Davies, M.A.
*[https://catalog.hathitrust.org/Record/008618745 Demosthenes], 1877, By the Rev. W. J. Brodribb, M.A.
*[https://catalog.hathitrust.org/Record/001395521 Aristotle], 1877, By Sir Alexander Grant, 10th Baronet, LL.D.
*[https://catalog.hathitrust.org/Record/008687119 Thucydides], 1878, By W. Lucas Collins, M.A.
*[https://catalog.hathitrust.org/Record/001544370 Lucretius], 1878, By William Hurrell Mallock, M.A.
*[https://catalog.hathitrust.org/Record/100387272 Pindar], 1879, By the Rev. Francis David Morice, M.A.
